description: Classic Italian pasta dish with meat sauce
Breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese
Sliced beef cooked with vegetables in a savory sauce
A flavorful mix of vegetables in a spicy curry sauce
Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection
Crisp romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing and croutons
Creamy Arborio rice cooked with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese
Tender pork ribs glazed with barbecue sauce
Grilled lamb or chicken wrapped in a warm pita with tzatziki sauce and vegetables
Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream
